live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37142.summary: Some customers in the south area of Dryden are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37142.title: Apr 28 – Dryden | All Services - Outage (Resolved)

live_updates: ENMAX Power is still working to restore power to affected areas. Our services will begin to come online as power is restored to our equipment. Thank you for your patience.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
37143.summary: Some customers in Crescent Heights area of Calgary are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
37143.title: May 7 – Calgary (Crescent Heights) | All Services - Outage (Fix in Progress)
